text: Does anyone know what this is…target=“_blank” data-hs-link-id=“0" ” and why that is added to the template when viewing the live email
I believe this is added to each link in the email for the heatmap / tracking of clicks in HubSpot

and it being target="_blank" means it'll open in a new window without taking the users away from the view online page so they can get back to it with ease if there is other things in the email they want to view
<@UN0LAJR3J> Thanks so much for this info!
Hi guys how to show the mobile version when we forward a mail in outlook,actually when I am forwarding a mail in outlook it is taking a desktop design styling not the mobile design.

Hi everyone,
Is it possible with HS email template:

• Create module with 12 rich text areas. Each one would be for a different language transation
• If a specific language is set on a contact property the email template would select the correct rich text block to insert into the email template
